content: i love knitting baby blankets i hope you like this one - it s easy to knit and a great gender-neutral design in a range of sizes and easy to adjust gauge/ gauge 22sts = 4 10cm requirements around 90 - 100g of dk yarn for the smallest size up to 350g for the biggest size 4mm needles so sweet **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
